title: HG
blurb: Two player social dance with HMDs
content_html:
Inspiration

Two player interaction that involves close contact

What it does

It asks two individuals to manipulate their views and contort their bodies to something that resembles a dance

How we built it

We used Google VR Unity SDK and Unity Networking to create a different multiplayer VR experience

Challenges we ran into

To let chance create humorous positions or to choreograph the movements

Accomplishments that we're proud of

First time developing for Android and Google VR

What we learned

Unity screen attributes and Google VR classes and handlers

What's next for HG

Sleep
